decision_conditions: The submitted details of the noise impact assessment in pursuant to condition 8 of planning application Ref: 234491FUL dated 22/08/2024 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition.  The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Standard 30 London Housing SPG
2016, policies D14 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of a Noise Impact Assessment in pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 234491FUL dated 22/08/2024 for 'Conversion of two-storey single family dwellinghouse into three self-contained residential units; and single storey rear and side wrap around extension (following demolition of rear structures)'
